ygData.subject: Re: jmxremote.password issues
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem is the permissions are correct. As you can see from the screenshot the user launching heritrix has read access and that is all.

The problem is the permissions are correct. As you can see from the screens=
hot the user launching heritrix has read access and that is all.

--- In ar=

ript automation.

nd in general it does

officially supported

and other major
